headline: Entergy Launches $100,000 Power Your Future Scholarship To Support Technology Students at HBCUs
summary: NEW ORLEANS, LA / ACCESS Newswire / March 21, 2025 / Entergy is proud to announce the launch of its Power Your Future Scholarship program, designed to support current college undergraduates pursuing eligible technology majors who plan to further their ...
